title: A Framework for Overcoming Resolution and Sensitivity Limits in 7nm Node Technology Inspection via Automated Imaging and Analysis
content: Semiconductor technology has reached the 7nm technology node, necessitating high-resolution imaging for the discernment of intricate features such as transistors, vias, and STIs on electronic chips [1]. However, conventional imaging processes [2] are plagued by extended durations, often extending up to 60 days [3]. This manuscript introduces a comprehensive framework that tackles these challenges through the development of a fully automated imaging station, with an emphasis on optimization based on feature size and repetition.
